page.title: 19MELODIANS
page.content: Formed late summer of 1980.It was inspired by the need to raise funds for the local boys club and the village hall. The first show was performed for 2 nights in November of that year. This show was then performed again in March1981 as well as being taken 'on tour'. This was followed in June 1981 by a 'Black and White Minstral Show' this time for 4 nights. Since then there has been 4 more productions. Each year the dress rehersal is videoed before an invited audience. Between each year shows the Melodians do numerous shows for charity,churches and old People's Homes.
